action.speaker: Sindelicious
action.helper: This action will fire a subtitle on your bottom portion of the screen, The duration must complete in order for the next action to call. Type value just keep at 1 for now.
action.title: Yeah! I like dancing on counters!

action.help: This action will move an entity with several custom parameter
action.helper: This action will move an entity with several custom parameter
action.position_change_helper:
Write 'current' in position_tag for get current node,mappin, fasttravel, custom_place or custom_room. 
 For poi if you write 'current' in position_poi_district you will get the current district, 
 if you write 'current in position_poi_subdistrict you will get the current subdistrict. 
 also if you write 'random' in position_poi_subdistrict or position_poi_district, you will get an 'random' value
action.name: move
wait_for_trigger
